title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop and maintain user-facing features using React and TailwindCSS.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design REST APIs and integrate databases for job portal backend services.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create wireframes, prototypes, and improve overall user experience.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work on both frontend and backend, building scalable job portal features.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and provide business insights.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop Android and iOS apps using Flutter and Kotlin.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, monitor cloud infrastructure, and optimize deployments.

title: QA Engineer
description: Test software applications, report bugs, and ensure quality standards.

title: Product Manager
description: Define product roadmap, coordinate with teams, and deliver high-quality features.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor network threats, ensure data security, and implement security protocols.
